name: Free Meals
description: Martin de Porres House of Hospitality is a free restaurant. Dining is available in the dining room and outdoor courtyard. - Most meals are vegetarian and often vegan. - Lunch includes hot soup, fruit, hard-boiled egg, bread and small snack. (A water fountain is available to fill personally provided water bottles.) - Monday meals consist of oatmeal, pastries, fruit, pancakes, hard-boiled egg, coffee and tea. Open Hours: - Lunch - Monday to Saturday: 12PM to 2PM Service Contact Information: - Emai
